thread.title: Triton Digital® Expands Canadian Sales Team to Further Accelerate the Digital Audio Industry Throughout the Region

author: cnbc.com
title: Triton Digital® Expands Canadian Sales Team to Further Accelerate the Digital Audio Industry Throughout the Region
text:
With Extensive Experience in Digital Media, Jeff Galad Will Expand Triton Digital’s Publisher Partnerships in Canada
MONTREAL--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Triton Digital® , the global technology and services leader to the digital audio and podcast industry, today announced that Jeff Galad has joined the company as Publisher Development Manager. Galad, proficient in both English and French, will conduct sales, business development, and publisher relationship operations on behalf of Triton Digital in Toronto, Montreal, and other regions of Canada.
This press release features multimedia. View the full release here: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180313005491/en/
Jeff Galad joins Triton Digital as Publisher Development Manager (Photo: Business Wire)
Galad brings an extensive background in sales, digital advertising, and account management to Triton Digital, having served as Manager of Mobile Sales for OATH, a subsidiary of Verizon Communications, where he sold AOL and Microsoft products to businesses including mobile and video campaigns, as well as increasing client’s ad spend through programmatic deals. Prior to OATH, Galad served as Senior Account Executive at JUICE Mobile and National Account Executive at Postmedia Network.
“With proven success in digital advertising and account management, Jeff will undoubtedly be a valuable resource to our Canadian clients,” said Stephanie Donovan, SVP of Publisher Development, North America. “We are excited to have him join our Team and look forward to his contributions as we advocate for the overall growth of the online audio industry in Canada.”
“It’s an incredibly exciting time for digital audio in Canada, and I am thrilled to be joining the Triton Digital team to help support Publishers in scaling their content, growing their audience, and increasing their revenue,” said Galad. “With an unrivaled technology stack and continuous global expansion, there is no better time than the present to be joining Triton Digital to further build, support, and promote the digital audio industry in Canada.”
About Triton Digital
Triton Digital® is the global technology and services leader to the digital audio and podcast industry. Operating in more than 40 countries, Triton Digital provides innovative technology that enables broadcasters, podcasters, and online music services to build their audience, maximize their revenue, and streamline their day-to-day operations. In addition, Triton Digital powers the global online audio industry with Webcast Metrics®, the leading online audio measurement service, that makes it easy for advertisers and brands to determine the best destination and time to reach their target audiences. Through unparalleled integrity, excellence, teamwork, and accountability, Triton Digital remains committed to connecting audio, audience, and advertisers to continuously fuel the growth of the global online industry. For more information, visit www.TritonDigital.com .
View source version on businesswire.com : http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180313005491/en/
